Gerçektende akıl zorlayan bulmacaları olsun akıcı hikayesi olsun karakterleri olsun grafikleri olsun beni herşeyiyle kendine bağlayan bir başyapıt diyebilirim alın oynayın indirime girsin girmesin parasını sonuna kadar hakediyor.

Artılar+
Akıcı hikaye.
Güzel aksiyon sekansları.
Eğlenceli karakterler.
Oyunun bulunduğu mekana göre çok uyumlu grafikler.
Portalgun.
Wheatley.
Gizemli easter eggler(valve oyunu easter eggsiz olmaz demi.)
Bug veya glitch yok denicek kadar az hatta yok.
Güzel bir final.

Eksiler-
Fps diyebilirmiyiz bilmiyorum ama vurdulu kırdı 360 noscopeli oyunları seven kesim uzak dursun.
Bazen bilmeceleri çözmek için gerçektende çok zeka istiyor bunu eksilere koydum çünkü her zekada insana göre pek tasarlanmamış.
Çok azda olsa arasıra fps dropları görünebiliyor bunlar genelde max 3,4 saniyelik ve az yaşanıyor ama yinede var.

Bukadar alın oynayın zeka zorlayan oyunları seviyorsanız tam size göre =)

This game is actually good for your brain so beat that parents. It’s also really fun and has a cool concept so you really have no excuse to not play it.. unless you don’t have enough money to afford it. And yes, I am talking about both the first and second. So the question everyone is probably asking if your a fan of portal, Will there be a Portal 3? Can’t say much.. but I do know that if the first and second game are that successful, they will most likely make a third portal game. This game tells a very good and interesting story that will change video game history. So do I agree that Portal is a win? Absolutely! I will undoubtably love to see a Portal 3 in the future. But I will warn valve and here’s why. When making a video game or a movie, people tend to try making it better than the original than actually making a good presentation. That is why sequel’s to movies today are good, just not as good as the first one. Think of it as this way. Your favorite song just got a new cover for it. It’s good but you still like the original better. So I do think Portal is a great game and would love to see a Portal 3 in the future.

Geniales Spiel! 
Wer bereits Fan der ebenfalls von Valve entwickelten Spiele "Half-Life" und" Half-Life 2" ist, dem ist das Spiel nur zu empfehlen. Mit dem mit "Black Mesa" (Half-Life) in Verbindung stehenden Labor "Aperture Science" haben die Valve-Entwickler das Mysterium der beiden Forschungslabore weiterleben lassen. Die zum Teil krassen Easter-Eggs, die in Portal 2 zu finden sind, gewähren einen immer tieferen Einblick in die Beziehung der beiden Labore und deren Hintergrundsgeschichten!

Aber auch für Leute, die einfach nur auf Spiele stehen, bei denen man mal sein Hirn nutzen muss, ist Portal 2 eine gute Investition. Um die ganze Story hinter dem Spiel zu verstehen, sollte man allerdings vorher Portal 1 gespielt haben, auch wenn die Story größtenteils ohne jenes gespielt zu haben, nachzuvollziehen ist (persönliche Meinung).

Für mich auch im Jahr 2017 noch eines meiner Lieblingsspiele. Mit seinen völlig eigenem Humor, den vielen Esater Eggs, dem COOP-Modus und den Community-Testkammern kann man seeeeehr viel Zeit verbringen.

As a VERY casual Portal player I would have to reccomend Portal 2 to anybody with a knack for solving puzzles. The co-op along with the community creations and storyline add infinite amounts of playing time. I haven't completed anything and I just messed around really for 42 hours because of how fun the game is. The game even has extras that I have played/watched multiple times threwout my years of ownership of the game. Overall I would give the game an 8.8/10, a decent must play. The only problem with the game for me is that the fact that the game get's boring after about an hour of play time, but is easily revisitable the next day or even in a few hours as the game leaves you wanting more.

I just want to start off by saying if you are curious, play the first portal. It is much drier but still a challenge. Portal 2 has alot of great humor, I was laughing through alot of the game, it was great in the sense that they knew how to keep you entertained how they did. Great puzzles, now I beat this in 2 days, but played through a few more times, the campaign is fun as well as the online content created maps that the community put out there, alot of them can blow you out of the water thinking about how they work and the effort the community puts into it. If you are looking for a reason not to by this game there really aren't any, great campaign, great puzzles.

（10/10）
it's okay

A true sequel. Everything Portal does, Portal 2 does better. It looks better, has more content and offers more variety, is more exposition and story-heavy, but not to a degree which would be detrimental to the core gameplay. It is a niche genre, but a game for everyone, both challenging and forgiving enough. While a tad too easy sometimes, it still is rewarding after its more difficult sequences are beaten. If you liked Portal, certainly give this one a try, it indeed is a time well spent.

Edit: also the co-op is amazing, truly one of the best gaming experiences I've ever had. Puzzles are much more complex and are genuinely fun to figure out.

I would recommend this game. Even after completing the story, I still go back to the campaign every once in a while. You can play with a friend, whether online or local, in either the Valve created puzzles or community made, unless you plan to play locally on a community made map, because that, to my knowledge, is not possible. Regardless, I would still recommend this game.

Edit: You can play community maps locally, but you need to use console commands, among other things. I've provided a link to a Steam discussion about this: https://steamcommunity.com/app/620/discussions/0/626329820665692314/

You know I decided, I'll play Portal and Portal 2 in one week!
Portal was a 2 hour experience 
Portal 2 was about triple that

Now maybe you've played Portal and you enjoyed it so you're looking at Portal 2 and wondering is it worth it? The answer is YES I still can not believe how much better Portal 2 is than its predesescor, it truly is remarkable. The Puzzles, The Story, Graphics, Gameplay and even the general flow of the game all blow the original Portal away. If you enjoyed Portal then you are doing yourself a disservice not playing this and if you've played neither then get them both!

Going in I didn't think it was going to be as good as it was but Valve truly made something special with this one. Just when you nail down a new obstacle they introduce another keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting. The game has three incredible voices giving you instruction or insulting you the entire game and it's a very entertaining experience.

Listen... If you enjoy video games, a good story, puzzles or even neat easter eggs this game IS A MUST BUY!!!

Do I really even need to talk about this one? It's regarded as one of the best puzzle games ever by some people, it's story is interesting, it has a slightly active online mode which is great, and you can play it forever with the workshop functionality. The real question is not, is it good, it is, why do you not have this game?
Get it. Now.
